role.descr: subject matter that the intuition applies to, question answered

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: He listened to his intuition that drawings of a mouse would sell and entertain millions one day.
example.arg: that drawings of a mouse would sell and entertain millions one day

example.name: args 0, 2
example.text: His intuition about women is how he ended up with such a gem of a lady
